title: Search for COVID-19 cure: Coronavirus’ possible weak spot found | World – Gulf News
content: The technique of convalescent plasma, first used in the 1890s against diphtheria, seems to work against COVID-19 too. A pilot study conducted at three hospitals in China suggested the benefits of harvesting antibodies from recovered people and administering it to people battling COVID-19.
warning: Based on the content, language and advertisements on this page, there is a risk that this page is not credible!
